messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2551
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/25/02 2:59:49 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Thank you. That means a lot. :o) You know, he did give me a love of nature, he stood up for
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/25/02 2:59:49 PM Central Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

> {{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{Nancy}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
>

Thank you. That means a lot. :o)

You know, he did give me a love of nature, he stood up for me against unfair
teachers, he took me everywhere, all over the world, I got to do things many
children never get to do. I think that is why the rest hurt so much. I did
know I had a loving Dad, somewhere.

~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2551
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/25/02 11:27:48 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/25/02 11:27:48 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Crap. Is your Dad's name William? I forgot about not letting the ice in
your
glass clink around too much. I'm crying now. >>

{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{Nancy}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
